column2: Solitario Zinc Corp. is a mineral exploration company, which focuses on the acquisition of precious and base metal properties with exploration potential, and the purchase of royalty interests. The company is headquartered in Wheat Ridge, Colorado and currently employs 4 full-time employees. Solitario has significant joint venture interests in two large, high-grade zinc development projects. Florida Canyon Zinc Project in Peru is a high-grade development asset held jointly with Nexa Resources S.A., and the Lik Zinc Project represents a large-tonnage, high-grade, open pittalble development project in Alaska in partnership with Teck Resources. In addition, Solitario has an additional portfolio of exploration properties and royalties in the Americas.
